titles.title: To designate the United States courthouse located at 555 Independence Street, Cape Girardeau, Missouri, as the "Rush H. Limbaugh, Sr., United States Courthouse".
To designate the United States courthouse located at 555 Independence Street, Cape Girardeau, Missouri, as the "Rush H. Limbaugh, Sr., United States Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation.

bill.summary: Designates the United States courthouse located at 555 Independence Street, Cape Girardeau. Missouri, as the Rush H. Limbaugh, Sr. United States Courthouse.
